page.title: 02AMMANFORD - SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: Ammanford is quite a small town, yet it is the main shopping centre of the Amman Valley. The town has four hairdressers, six clothes shops, three chemists and six restaurants and cafes. Many of these shops have opened in the last five years, but "Evans the Chemist" is an old establishment. There are three butcheries and three bakeries serving the area, along with two newsagents, two hardware and one D.I.Y. store. The area's wealth may be reflected in three electric appliance stores, three jewellers and computer and video shops found in the town. Ammanford also boasts two sports shops, five shoe shops and two travel agents. Recent additions are a Chinese take-away and an Indian restaurant. Derelict houses are also being refurbished for business in Wind St.
